thread.title: Born To Rule: the unauthorised biography of Malcolm Turnbull
thread.title_full: Born To Rule: the unauthorised biography of Malcolm Turnbull

author: ABC Radio National
title: Born To Rule: the unauthorised biography of Malcolm Turnbull
text:
In his first few weeks in the nation's top job, Malcolm Turnbull has been portrayed by his supporters as a passionate, forward-thinking, optimistic reformer. 
While his detractors have attempted to paint him as a wealthy, out-of-touch, ego-driven narcissist. 
A new book out today will provide even more fodder for this debate over what drives our new Prime Minister. 
It's called Born To Rule: the unauthorised biography of Malcolm Turnbull . 
The book charts his path to power, from school prefect, to journalist, businessman and finally politician. 
The author is journalist Paddy Manning, who joins Fran Kelly on RN Breakfast .
